content: introducing the summer days iced coffee cup cozy pattern this iced coffee cup cozy is such a modern light and environmentally friendly cozy it is reusable and a versatile and eco-friendly option for your iced coffee or frozen beverage even for bubble tea or a smoothie it is recommended that you use cotton for this project i used bernat handicrafter cotton solids 4 worsted weight the summer days iced coffee cup cozy is made with the simple half_double_crochet and the double_crochet stitch it is beginner friendly there is one row of back loop single_crochet this pattern was designed for the large 16 oz 454 ml plastic cup used for iced coffee bubble tea and smoothies the finished iced coffee cup cozy when laid flat measures 7 17 5 cm tall and 4 5 11 cm wide this is so it will stretch and fit snugly when fitted on the beverage cup
